스코어보드
/scoreboard objectives add dungeon_wait dummy
/scoreboard objectives add dungeon_timer dummy
/scoreboard objectives add dungeon_join dummy

플레이어
/gamemode adventure @a[scores={dungeon_join=1..},gamemode=!adventure]
/scoreboard players add @a[scores={dungeon_join=1..}] dungeon_timer 1

아머스탠드
/scorebaord players add @e[name=dungeon1] dungeon_timer 1

대사
/tellraw @a ["",{"text":"<페헤르> ","color":"green","bold":true},{"text":"도와주세요!","color":"green","bold":false}]

/tellraw @a ["",{"text":"! 경고 !","color":"red","bold":true}]
/tellraw @a ["",{"text":"야영지에서 ","color":"gold","bold":true},{"text":"허약한 좀비","color":"red","bold":true},{"text":"(이)가 나타났습니다!!!","color":"gold","bold":false}]
/tellraw @a ["",{"text":"야영지에서 ","color":"gold","bold":true},{"text":"Boss 건장한 좀비","color":"dark_red","bold":true},{"text":"(이)가 나타났습니다!!!","color":"gold","bold":false}]

곡괭이
/scoreboard objectives add dungeon1_clear dummy
/scoreboard objectives add dungeon2_clear dummy
/scoreboard objectives add break_stone minecraft.mined:minecraft.stone
/scoreboard objectives add break_cobble minecraft.mined:minecraft.cobblestone
/scoreboard objectives add break_diorite minecraft.mined:minecraft.diorite
/scoreboard objectives add break_granite minecraft.mined:minecraft.granite
/scoreboard objectives add break_andesite minecraft.mined:minecraft.andesite
/scoreboard objectives add break_gravel minecraft.mined:minecraft.gravel
/scoreboard objectives add break_dirt minecraft.mined:minecraft.dirt

/execute as @a[nbt={SelectedItem:{id:"minecraft:stone_pickaxe",tag:{display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"야영지 도굴꾼의 곡괭이\",\"color\":\"aqua\",\"bold\":true}",Lore:["{\"text\":\"조건 : 야영지 A영역 3번 클리어\",\"color\":\"red\",\"bold\":true}","{\"text\":\"능력 : 3x3x1의 돌을  한 번에 제거\",\"color\":\"gold\",\"bold\":true}","{\"text\":\"도굴꾼이 사용하던 곡괭이이다.\",\"color\":\"dark_aqua\"}"]},HideFlags:1,RepairCost:40,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:unbreaking",lvl:1}],AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.attackDamage",Name:"generic.attackDamage",Amount:6,Operation:0,UUIDLeast:906317,UUIDMost:735150,Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attackSpeed",Name:"generic.attackSpeed",Amount:0.2,Operation:1,UUIDLeast:643049,UUIDMost:644431,Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.maxHealth",Name:"generic.maxHealth",Amount:4,Operation:0,UUIDLeast:220323,UUIDMost:148355,Slot:"mainhand"}]}}}] at @s run scoreboard players set @p require_true 1

던전 - 야영지 구역

무한회로
/setblock ~ ~ ~ minecraft:repeating_command_block[facing=north]{auto:1b} replace
/setblock ~ ~ ~ minecraft:repeating_command_block[facing=east]{auto:1b} replace
/setblock ~ ~ ~ minecraft:repeating_command_block[facing=west]{auto:1b} replace
/setblock ~ ~ ~ minecraft:repeating_command_block[facing=south]{auto:1b} replace
/setblock ~ ~ ~ minecraft:repeating_command_block[facing=up]{auto:1b} replace
/setblock ~ ~ ~ minecraft:repeating_command_block[facing=down]{auto:1b} replace


던전 - 야영지 구역

/execute as @p[x=-10027,y=102,z=-10016,distance=..1,nbt={SelectedItem:{id:"minecraft:paper",tag:{display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"야영지 A구역 입장권\",\"color\":\"red\",\"bold\":true}",Lore:["{\"text\":\"야영지 A구역을 입장할 수 있는 티켓이다.\",\"color\":\"dark_red\"}","{\"text\":\"추천 레벨 40~80\",\"color\":\"dark_green\",\"bold\":true}","{\"text\":\"1성 유물 조각 획득지역\",\"color\":\"gold\"}"]}}}}] at @s run scoreboard players set @p dungeon_wait 1
/tellraw @a[x=-10027,y=102,z=-10016,distance=..40,scores={dungeon_wait=1}] ["",{"selector":"@p","color":"green","bold":true},{"text":"님이 ","color":"gold","bold":false},{"text":"<야영지 A영역>","color":"red","bold":true},{"text":" 탐험대에 합류하였습니다.","color":"gold","bold":false}]
/clear @p[x=-10027,y=102,z=-10016,distance=..1,scores={dungeon_wait=1}] minecraft:paper{display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"야영지 A구역 입장권\",\"color\":\"red\",\"bold\":true}",Lore:["{\"text\":\"야영지 A구역을 입장할 수 있는 티켓이다.\",\"color\":\"dark_red\"}","{\"text\":\"추천 레벨 40~80\",\"color\":\"dark_green\",\"bold\":true}","{\"text\":\"1성 유물 조각 획득지역\",\"color\":\"gold\"}"]}} 1

/scoreboard players set @a[scores={dungeon_wait=1}] dungeon_join 1
/scoreboard players set @a[scores={dungeon_wait=1}] dungeon_wait 0
/tp @a[scores={dungeon_join=1}] -10052 112 -10031
/execute if block -10057 110 -10016 minecraft:yellow_concrete run setblock -10057 110 -10016 air
/scoreboard players set @e[name=campA] dungeon_timer 0

/scoreboard players set @e[name=campA] dungeon_timer 0



--------------------------
/scoreboard players operation @p 500 %= @p dungeon_timer
/scoreboard players operation @p magic_timer = @p 500
/scoreboard players set @p 500 500

-----------무한------------
/gamemode adventure @a[scores={dungeon_join=1..},gamemode=!adventure]
/scoreboard players add @e[name=campA] dungeon_timer 1

/execute as @e[name=campA,scores={dungeon_timer=99}] run setblock -10052 95 -10019 minecraft:repeating_command_block[facing=east]{auto:1b} replace
/execute as @e[name=campA,scores={dungeon_timer=449}] run setblock -10045 95 -10019 minecraft:repeating_command_block[facing=east]{auto:1b} replace
/execute as @e[name=campA,scores={dungeon_timer=949}] run setblock -10052 95 -10021 minecraft:repeating_command_block[facing=east]{auto:1b} replace
/execute as @e[name=campA,scores={dungeon_timer=1449}] run setblock -10042 95 -10021 minecraft:repeating_command_block[facing=east]{auto:1b} replace

WAVE6------------------
/execute as @e[name=campA,scores={dungeon_timer=2700}] at @s run summon zombie -10049 110 -10016 {Fire:-20,CustomNameVisible:1b,Health:250f,CustomName:"{\"text\":\"[BOSS]간부 좀비 Lv50\",\"color\":\"red\",\"bold\":true}",HandItems:[{id:"minecraft:golden_sword",Count:1b,tag:{Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:sharpness",lvl:1}]}},{id:"minecraft:paper",Count:1b,tag:{display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"던전 토큰\",\"color\":\"gold\",\"bold\":true}"}}}],HandDropChances:[0.85F,0.1F],ArmorItems:[{id:"minecraft:sugar",Count:4b,tag:{display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"1성 유물가루\",\"color\":\"gray\",\"bold\":true}"},HideFlags:1,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:unbreaking",lvl:1}]}},{id:"minecraft:sugar",Count:6b,tag:{display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"1성 유물가루\",\"color\":\"gray\",\"bold\":true}"},HideFlags:1,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:unbreaking",lvl:1}]}},{id:"minecraft:yellow_concrete",Count:1b,tag:{CanPlaceOn:["minecraft:emerald_block"],display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"던전 정복\",\"color\":\"gold\",\"bold\":true,\"underlined\":true}",Lore:["{\"text\":\"에메랄드 블럭 위에 설치하면 던전 클리어!\",\"color\":\"blue\"}"]}}},{id:"minecraft:golden_helmet",Count:1b,tag:{Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:thorns",lvl:1}]}}],ArmorDropChances:[1.0F,0.5F,1.0F,0.0F],Attributes:[{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:250},{Name:generic.movementSpeed,Base:0.3},{Name:generic.attackDamage,Base:10}]}
/execute as @e[name=campA,scores={dungeon_timer=2800}] at @s run tellraw @a[scores={dungeon_join=1}] ["",{"text":"<페헤르> ","color":"green","bold":true},{"text":"힘내세요!! 저 녀석만 처치하면 끝이에요!","color":"green","bold":false}]

/scoreboard players add @e[name="[BOSS]간부 좀비 Lv50"] dungeon_timer 1
/scoreboard players set @e[name="[BOSS]간부 좀비 Lv50",scores={dungeon_timer=500}] dungeon_timer 0
/execute as @e[name="[BOSS]간부 좀비 Lv50",scores={dungeon_timer=450}] at @s run effect give @a[distance=..15] minecraft:instant_damage 1 1 true
/execute as @e[name="[BOSS]간부 좀비 Lv50",scores={dungeon_timer=450}] at @s run particle minecraft:explosion ~ ~ ~ 0.1 0.1 0.1 1 10 normal
/execute as @e[name="[BOSS]간부 좀비 Lv50",scores={dungeon_timer=450}] at @s run playsound minecraft:entity.generic.explode master @a[scores={dungeon_join=1}] ~ ~ ~ 10 1
/scoreboard players set @e[name="[BOSS]간부 좀비 Lv50",scores={dungeon_timer=500..}] dungeon_timer 0

/tellraw @a[x=-10025,y=102,z=-10016,distance=..40,scores={dungeon_wait=2}] ["",{"selector":"@p","color":"green","bold":true},{"text":"님이 ","color":"gold","bold":false},{"text":"<야영지 B영역>","color":"red","bold":true},{"text":" 탐험대에 합류하였습니다.","color":"gold","bold":false}]

WAVE5------------------
/setblock -10047 95 -10047 air
/execute if block -10078 109 -10048 minecraft:tnt run tellraw @a[scores={dungeon_join=3}] ["",{"text":"<폭탄> ","color":"red","bold":true},{"text":"(을)를 점화하였습니다.","color":"gold","bold":false}]
/execute if block -10078 109 -10048 minecraft:tnt run particle minecraft:explosion -10078 109 -10048 0.1 0.1 0.1 3 5 force
/execute if block -10078 109 -10048 minecraft:tnt run playsound minecraft:entity.generic.explode master @a[scores={dungeon_join=3}] -10078 109 -10048 10 1 
/execute if block -10078 109 -10048 minecraft:tnt run fill -10080 109 -10047 -10080 112 -10049 minecraft:air
/execute if block -10078 109 -10048 minecraft:tnt run scoreboard players set @e[name=desertA] dungeon_timer 299700
/execute if block -10078 109 -10048 minecraft:tnt run setblock -10078 109 -10048 air
/setblock -10095 95 -10045 air

/execute if block -10052 108 -10040 minecraft:tnt run setblock -10052 108 -10040 air
/setblock -10051 95 -10045 air

kill @e[type=item,name="Wither Skeleton Skull",distance=..200]
/gamemode adventure @a[scores={dungeon_join=3}]

---------------------------------
1성 뽑기

/scoreboard players set @a[scores={gambleticket=3}] gambleticket 0


---------------------------------


아이템 등급

회색 - 노멀
녹색 - 언커먼 (+3)
아쿠아 - 레어 (+5)
보라 - 에픽 (+7)
노랑 - 레전드 (+9)
레드 - 스페셜 (+11)
검은색 - 유니크 (+13)

1강 인첸트 +1
2강 인첸트 +1
3강 인첸트 +1
4강 인첸트 +2
5강 인첸트 +2

에트리뷰트 퍼센트증가
언커먼단계 10%
레어단계 20%
에픽단계 30%

무기의 경우 단계당 공+1


-----------------------------------
/scoreboard objectives add strength dummy
/scoreboard objectives add paper_handed dummy

1성 -----

/scoreboard players set @a[x=-10004,y=112,z=-9991,distance=..1,nbt={Inventory:[{Slot:-0b,id:"minecraft:prismarine_shard",Count:1b,tag:{display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"1성 유물조각\",\"color\":\"green\",\"bold\":true}",Lore:["{\"text\":\"레어 등급 이하의 장비를 강화할 때 사용된다.\",\"color\":\"dark_green\"}"]},HideFlags:1,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:unbreaking",lvl:1}]}}]}] strength 1
/execute as @a[x=-10004,y=112,z=-9991,distance=..1,nbt={SelectedItem:{id:"minecraft:paper",Count:1b,tag:{display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"백지 주문서\",\"color\":\"gray\",\"bold\":true}",Lore:["{\"text\":\"아무 것도 적혀있지않은 깨끗한 주문서\",\"color\":\"white\",\"bold\":true}"]}}}}] at @s run scoreboard players set @p paper_handed 1


/tellraw @a[x=-10004,y=112,z=-9991,distance=..1,scores={strength=1,paper_handed=1}] ["",{"text":"<백지 주문서>","color":"green","bold":true},{"text":" 강화를 시작합니다! ","color":"gold","bold":false},{"text":"(성공률 70%, 실패 시 등급하락)","color":"red","bold":true,"underlined":true}]

/clear @a[x=-10004,y=112,z=-9991,distance=..1,scores={strength=1,paper_handed=1}] minecraft:prismarine_shard{display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"1성 유물조각\",\"color\":\"green\",\"bold\":true}",Lore:["{\"text\":\"레어 등급 이하의 장비를 강화할 때 사용된다.\",\"color\":\"dark_green\"}"]},HideFlags:1,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:unbreaking",lvl:1}]} 1
/clear @a[x=-10004,y=112,z=-9991,distance=..1,scores={strength=1,paper_handed=1}] minecraft:paper{display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"백지 주문서\",\"color\":\"gray\",\"bold\":true}",Lore:["{\"text\":\"아무 것도 적혀있지않은 깨끗한 주문서\",\"color\":\"white\",\"bold\":true}"]}} 1

/tellraw @a[x=-10004,y=112,z=-9991,distance=..1,scores={strength=1,paper_handed=1,gamble=0..69}] ["",{"text":"<백지 주문서>","color":"green","bold":true},{"text":" 강화 결과 ","color":"gold","bold":false},{"text":"성공!!!","color":"blue","bold":true,"underlined":true}]
/tellraw @a[x=-10004,y=112,z=-9991,distance=..1,scores={strength=1,paper_handed=1,gamble=70..99}] ["",{"text":"<백지 주문서>","color":"green","bold":true},{"text":" 강화 결과 ","color":"gold","bold":false},{"text":"실패...","color":"red","bold":true,"underlined":true}]

/execute as @a[x=-10004,y=112,z=-9991,distance=..1,scores={strength=1,paper_handed=1,gamble=0..69}] at @s run playsound minecraft:block.anvil.use master @a[x=-10004,y=112,z=-9991,distance=..3] ~ ~ ~ 10 1
/execute as @a[x=-10004,y=112,z=-9991,distance=..1,scores={strength=1,paper_handed=1,gamble=70..99}] at @s run playsound minecraft:block.anvil.destroy master @a[x=-10004,y=112,z=-9991,distance=..3] ~ ~ ~ 10 1

/give @a[x=-10004,y=112,z=-9991,distance=..1,scores={strength=1,paper_handed=1,gamble=0..69}] minecraft:paper{display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"강화 주문서 +1\",\"color\":\"green\",\"bold\":true}",Lore:["{\"text\":\"장비를 +1 강화 상태로 유지시킨다.\",\"color\":\"dark_green\"}"]},HideFlags:1,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:unbreaking",lvl:1}]} 1
/give @a[x=-10004,y=112,z=-9991,distance=..1,scores={strength=1,paper_handed=1,gamble=70..84}] minecraft:paper{display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"백지 주문서\",\"color\":\"gray\",\"bold\":true}",Lore:["{\"text\":\"아무 것도 적혀있지않은 깨끗한 주문서\",\"color\":\"white\",\"bold\":true}"]}} 1

2성 -----

/scoreboard players set @a[x=-10004,y=112,z=-9991,distance=..1,nbt={Inventory:[{Slot:-0b,id:"minecraft:prismarine_shard",Count:3b,tag:{display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"1성 유물조각\",\"color\":\"green\",\"bold\":true}",Lore:["{\"text\":\"레어 등급 이하의 장비를 강화할 때 사용된다.\",\"color\":\"dark_green\"}"]},HideFlags:1,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:unbreaking",lvl:1}]}}]}] strength 2
/execute as @a[x=-10004,y=112,z=-9991,distance=..1,nbt={SelectedItem:{id:"minecraft:paper",Count:1b,tag:{display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"강화 주문서 +1\",\"color\":\"green\",\"bold\":true}",Lore:["{\"text\":\"장비를 +1 강화 상태로 유지시킨다.\",\"color\":\"dark_green\"}"]},HideFlags:1,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:unbreaking",lvl:1}]}}}] at @s run scoreboard players set @p paper_handed 2


/tellraw @a[x=-10004,y=112,z=-9991,distance=..1,scores={strength=2,paper_handed=2}] ["",{"text":"<강화 주문서 +1>","color":"green","bold":true},{"text":" 강화를 시작합니다! ","color":"gold","bold":false},{"text":"(성공률 70%, 실패 시 등급하락)","color":"red","bold":true,"underlined":true}]

/clear @a[x=-10004,y=112,z=-9991,distance=..1,scores={strength=2,paper_handed=2}] minecraft:prismarine_shard{display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"1성 유물조각\",\"color\":\"green\",\"bold\":true}",Lore:["{\"text\":\"레어 등급 이하의 장비를 강화할 때 사용된다.\",\"color\":\"dark_green\"}"]},HideFlags:1,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:unbreaking",lvl:1}]} 3
/clear @a[x=-10004,y=112,z=-9991,distance=..1,scores={strength=2,paper_handed=2}] minecraft:paper{display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"강화 주문서 +1\",\"color\":\"green\",\"bold\":true}",Lore:["{\"text\":\"장비를 +1 강화 상태로 유지시킨다.\",\"color\":\"dark_green\"}"]},HideFlags:1,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:unbreaking",lvl:1}]} 1

/tellraw @a[x=-10004,y=112,z=-9991,distance=..1,scores={strength=2,paper_handed=2,gamble=0..69}] ["",{"text":"<강화 주문서 + 1>","color":"green","bold":true},{"text":" 강화 결과 ","color":"gold","bold":false},{"text":"성공!!!","color":"blue","bold":true,"underlined":true}]
/tellraw @a[x=-10004,y=112,z=-9991,distance=..1,scores={strength=2,paper_handed=2,gamble=70..99}] ["",{"text":"<강화 주문서 + 1>","color":"green","bold":true},{"text":" 강화 결과 ","color":"gold","bold":false},{"text":"실패...","color":"red","bold":true,"underlined":true}]

/execute as @a[x=-10004,y=112,z=-9991,distance=..1,scores={strength=2,paper_handed=2,gamble=0..69}] at @s run playsound minecraft:block.anvil.use master @a[x=-10004,y=112,z=-9991,distance=..3] ~ ~ ~ 10 1
/execute as @a[x=-10004,y=112,z=-9991,distance=..1,scores={strength=2,paper_handed=2,gamble=70..99}] at @s run playsound minecraft:block.anvil.destroy master @a[x=-10004,y=112,z=-9991,distance=..3] ~ ~ ~ 10 1

/give @a[x=-10004,y=112,z=-9991,distance=..1,scores={strength=2,paper_handed=2,gamble=0..69}] minecraft:paper{display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"강화 주문서 +2\",\"color\":\"green\",\"bold\":true}",Lore:["{\"text\":\"장비를 +2 강화 상태로 유지시킨다.\",\"color\":\"dark_green\"}"]},HideFlags:1,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:unbreaking",lvl:1}]} 1
/give @a[x=-10004,y=112,z=-9991,distance=..1,scores={strength=2,paper_handed=2,gamble=70..84}] minecraft:paper{display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"백지 주문서\",\"color\":\"gray\",\"bold\":true}",Lore:["{\"text\":\"아무 것도 적혀있지않은 깨끗한 주문서\",\"color\":\"white\",\"bold\":true}"]}} 1

3성 -----

/scoreboard players set @a[x=-10004,y=112,z=-9991,distance=..1,nbt={Inventory:[{Slot:-0b,id:"minecraft:prismarine_shard",Count:6b,tag:{display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"1성 유물조각\",\"color\":\"green\",\"bold\":true}",Lore:["{\"text\":\"레어 등급 이하의 장비를 강화할 때 사용된다.\",\"color\":\"dark_green\"}"]},HideFlags:1,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:unbreaking",lvl:1}]}}]}] strength 3
/execute as @a[x=-10004,y=112,z=-9991,distance=..1,nbt={SelectedItem:{id:"minecraft:paper",Count:1b,tag:{display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"강화 주문서 +2\",\"color\":\"green\",\"bold\":true}",Lore:["{\"text\":\"장비를 +2 강화 상태로 유지시킨다.\",\"color\":\"dark_green\"}"]},HideFlags:1,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:unbreaking",lvl:1}]}}}] at @s run scoreboard players set @p paper_handed 3


/tellraw @a[x=-10004,y=112,z=-9991,distance=..1,scores={strength=3,paper_handed=3}] ["",{"text":"<강화 주문서 +2>","color":"green","bold":true},{"text":" 강화를 시작합니다! ","color":"gold","bold":false},{"text":"(성공률 70%, 실패 시 등급하락)","color":"red","bold":true,"underlined":true}]

/clear @a[x=-10004,y=112,z=-9991,distance=..1,scores={strength=3,paper_handed=3}] minecraft:prismarine_shard{display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"1성 유물조각\",\"color\":\"green\",\"bold\":true}",Lore:["{\"text\":\"레어 등급 이하의 장비를 강화할 때 사용된다.\",\"color\":\"dark_green\"}"]},HideFlags:1,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:unbreaking",lvl:1}]} 6
/clear @a[x=-10004,y=112,z=-9991,distance=..1,scores={strength=3,paper_handed=3}] minecraft:paper{display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"강화 주문서 +2\",\"color\":\"green\",\"bold\":true}",Lore:["{\"text\":\"장비를 +2 강화 상태로 유지시킨다.\",\"color\":\"dark_green\"}"]},HideFlags:1,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:unbreaking",lvl:1}]} 1

/tellraw @a[x=-10004,y=112,z=-9991,distance=..1,scores={strength=3,paper_handed=3,gamble=0..69}] ["",{"text":"<강화 주문서 + 2>","color":"green","bold":true},{"text":" 강화 결과 ","color":"gold","bold":false},{"text":"성공!!!","color":"blue","bold":true,"underlined":true}]
/tellraw @a[x=-10004,y=112,z=-9991,distance=..1,scores={strength=3,paper_handed=3,gamble=70..99}] ["",{"text":"<강화 주문서 + 2>","color":"green","bold":true},{"text":" 강화 결과 ","color":"gold","bold":false},{"text":"실패...","color":"red","bold":true,"underlined":true}]

/execute as @a[x=-10004,y=112,z=-9991,distance=..1,scores={strength=3,paper_handed=3,gamble=0..69}] at @s run playsound minecraft:block.anvil.use master @a[x=-10004,y=112,z=-9991,distance=..3] ~ ~ ~ 10 1
/execute as @a[x=-10004,y=112,z=-9991,distance=..1,scores={strength=3,paper_handed=3,gamble=70..99}] at @s run playsound minecraft:block.anvil.destroy master @a[x=-10004,y=112,z=-9991,distance=..3] ~ ~ ~ 10 1

/give @a[x=-10004,y=112,z=-9991,distance=..1,scores={strength=3,paper_handed=3,gamble=0..69}] minecraft:paper{display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"강화 주문서 +3\",\"color\":\"green\",\"bold\":true}",Lore:["{\"text\":\"장비를 +3 강화 상태로 유지시킨다.\",\"color\":\"dark_green\"}"]},HideFlags:1,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:unbreaking",lvl:1}]} 1
/give @a[x=-10004,y=112,z=-9991,distance=..1,scores={strength=3,paper_handed=3,gamble=70..84}] minecraft:paper{display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"강화 주문서 +1\",\"color\":\"green\",\"bold\":true}",Lore:["{\"text\":\"장비를 +1 강화 상태로 유지시킨다.\",\"color\":\"dark_green\"}"]},HideFlags:1,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:unbreaking",lvl:1}]} 1

4성 -----

/scoreboard players set @a[x=-10004,y=112,z=-9991,distance=..1,nbt={Inventory:[{Slot:-0b,id:"minecraft:prismarine_shard",Count:12b,tag:{display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"1성 유물조각\",\"color\":\"green\",\"bold\":true}",Lore:["{\"text\":\"레어 등급 이하의 장비를 강화할 때 사용된다.\",\"color\":\"dark_green\"}"]},HideFlags:1,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:unbreaking",lvl:1}]}}]}] strength 4

/tellraw @a[x=-10004,y=112,z=-9991,distance=..1,scores={strength=4,paper_handed=4,gamble=60..99}] ["",{"text":"<강화 주문서 + 3>","color":"green","bold":true},{"text":" 강화 결과 ","color":"gold","bold":false},{"text":"실패...","color":"red","bold":true,"underlined":true}]

------------종료---------

/scoreboard players set @a[x=-10004,y=112,z=-9991,distance=..1,scores={strength=1..}] strength 0
/scoreboard players set @a[x=-10004,y=112,z=-9991,distance=..1,scores={paper_handed=1..}] paper_handed 0

/execute as @a[y_rotation=-22.5..22.5] at @s run scoreboard players set @p y_rotation 1
/execute as @a[y_rotation=22.5..67.5] at @s run scoreboard players set @p y_rotation 2
/execute as @a[y_rotation=67.5..112.5] at @s run scoreboard players set @p y_rotation 3
/execute as @a[y_rotation=112.5..157.5] at @s run scoreboard players set @p y_rotation 4
/execute as @a[y_rotation=-180..-157.5] at @s run scoreboard players set @p y_rotation 5
/execute as @a[y_rotation=157.5..180] at @s run scoreboard players set @p y_rotation 5
/execute as @a[y_rotation=-157.5..-112.5] at @s run scoreboard players set @p y_rotation 6
/execute as @a[y_rotation=-112.5..-67.5] at @s run scoreboard players set @p y_rotation 7
/execute as @a[y_rotation=-67.5..-22.5] at @s run scoreboard players set @p y_rotation 8


/execute as @a[x_rotation=-90..-78.75] at @s run scoreboard players set @p x_rotation 1
/execute as @a[x_rotation=-78.75..-67.5] at @s run scoreboard players set @p x_rotation 2
/execute as @a[x_rotation=-67.5..-56.25] at @s run scoreboard players set @p x_rotation 3
/execute as @a[x_rotation=-56.25..-45] at @s run scoreboard players set @p x_rotation 4
/execute as @a[x_rotation=-45..-33.75] at @s run scoreboard players set @p x_rotation 5
/execute as @a[x_rotation=-33.75..-22.25] at @s run scoreboard players set @p x_rotation 6
/execute as @a[x_rotation=-22.5..-11.25] at @s run scoreboard players set @p x_rotation 7
/execute as @a[x_rotation=-11.25..0] at @s run scoreboard players set @p x_rotation 8

/execute as @a[x_rotation=0..11.25] at @s run scoreboard players set @p x_rotation 9
/execute as @a[x_rotation=11.25..22.25] at @s run scoreboard players set @p x_rotation 10
/execute as @a[x_rotation=22.25..33.75] at @s run scoreboard players set @p x_rotation 11
/execute as @a[x_rotation=33.75..45] at @s run scoreboard players set @p x_rotation 12

/scoreboard players enable @a info
/execute as @a[scores={info=1..}] run setblock 10005 102 10014 redstone_block

/execute as @a[scores={info=1}] at @s run tellraw @p ["",{"selector":"@s]","color":"green","bold":true,"underlined":true},{"text":"님의 개인 정보입니다.","color":"gold","bold":true,"underlined":false}]
/execute as @a[scores={info=1}] at @s run tellraw @p ["",{"selector":"","color":"green","bold":true,"underlined":true}]

/execute as @a[scores={info=1,job=..1}] at @s run scoreboard players set @p job 0

/execute as @a[scores={info=1,job=0}] at @s run tellraw @p ["",{"text":"직업 : ","color":"red","bold":"true"},{"text":"무직","color":"red","bold":"true"}]

--------------------------------------------
직업 버프

/scoreboard players add @a buff_timer 1
/scoreboard players set @a[scores={buff_timer=12000..}] buff_timer 0
/execute as @a[scores={job=1,job_level=1}] at @s run scoreboard players add @p set_regeneration 10
/execute as @a[scores={job=2,job_level=1}] at @s run scoreboard players add @p set_speed 10
/execute as @a[scores={job=6,job_level=1}] at @s run scoreboard players add @p set_resistance 10

/effect give @a[scores={job=1,set_regeneration=10..19,buff_timer=100}] minecraft:regeneration 20 0 true
/effect give @a[scores={job=1,set_regeneration=20..29,buff_timer=100}] minecraft:regeneration 20 1 true
/effect give @a[scores={job=1,set_regeneration=30..39,buff_timer=100}] minecraft:regeneration 20 2 true
/effect give @a[scores={job=1,set_regeneration=40..49,buff_timer=100}] minecraft:regeneration 20 3 true
/effect give @a[scores={job=1,set_regeneration=50..59,buff_timer=100}] minecraft:regeneration 20 4 true

/effect give @a[scores={set_resistance=10..19,buff_timer=100}] minecraft:resistance 3 0 true
/effect give @a[scores={set_resistance=20..29,buff_timer=100}] minecraft:resistance 5 0 true
/effect give @a[scores={set_resistance=30..39,buff_timer=100}] minecraft:resistance 7 0 true
/effect give @a[scores={set_resistance=40..49,buff_timer=100}] minecraft:resistance 9 0 true
/effect give @a[scores={set_resistance=50..59,buff_timer=100}] minecraft:resistance 3 1 true
/effect give @a[scores={set_speed=10..19,buff_timer=100}] minecraft:speed 20 0 true
/effect give @a[scores={set_speed=20..29,buff_timer=100}] minecraft:speed 20 1 true
/effect give @a[scores={set_speed=30..39,buff_timer=100}] minecraft:speed 20 2 true
/effect give @a[scores={set_speed=40..49,buff_timer=100}] minecraft:speed 20 3 true
/effect give @a[scores={set_speed=50..59,buff_timer=100}] minecraft:speed 20 4 true

/scoreboard players set @a[scores={set_regeneration=1..}] set_regeneration 0
/scoreboard players set @a[scores={set_resistance=1..}] set_resistance 0
/scoreboard players set @a[scores={set_speed=1..}] set_speed 0
/execute as @a[scores={buff_timer=400..}] at @s run scoreboard players set @p buff_timer 0

5등 이하 참여상 : 던전코인 50개 / 5,000 마크 중 1개
